name: To the Bridge: Dungeoncrawler Jam Edition
name_original: To the Bridge: Dungeoncrawler Jam Edition
description:
A very quick game about a Lord escaping captivity on a spaceship. Fight through hostile robots to reach the bridge and take out the ship from within.

Controls:

Arrow_Keys for Movement

Mouse for Interaction

Build for the Dungeoncrawler Jam 2021.

Lot's of stuff missing, lots of cut content, but a joy to build and experience.

We've learned a lot during the jam.
